name: 荷蘭語言及文化研究
description: 藉由本課程讓學生了解初級荷蘭語：讀文，說話，寫字。訓練學生具有使用荷蘭語的基本能力，及初級荷蘭語的聽力能力，並培養學生觀察荷蘭的文化及社會。
goals: 初級荷蘭語 : 讀文，說話，寫字: 訓練學生利用荷蘭語的基本功能
培養學生觀察荷蘭的文化及社會
syllabus:
**週1**  2月 23日 Introduction 

Hand out of the syllabus and explanation of the course (1)

Explanation: This course will introduce the basics of the Dutch language through vocabulary and grammar depending on the degree of interest among the students. Otherwise, the main focus will be on introducing academic topics that are related to the Dutch language and culture in humanities. These topics are: (1) history of Dutch literature, with a focus on children’s literature; (2) the Dutch language in overseas expansion history, with a focus on Southeast Asia; (3) language policies in Dutch speaking countries; (4) popular culture studies related to Dutch language and society; (5) Dutch heritage in Taiwan.       

Assignment: students look for materials related to the Dutch language and culture for discussion next week (week 2). This material can be related to the master/ph.d. thesis.

Language materials:  

Siarcone, A.G., Meijer, P.J. (eds) _Delftse Methode. Basiscursus 1. Nederlands voor buitenlanders. Tekstboek_ (Boom, 2004, 2008) \[DEL\]
